field.name: summary
field.value: Overloaded method signatures create ambiguous invocation compiler errors

comment.author: p.w
comment.text: Please disregard and close this issue. I got a little out of sync with myself. :-)

comment.text: ok. Make sure you're not reporting issues that have already been fixed and verify on the latest version first. thanks.
